attributes.action: To make no additional contributions to the EU budget in support of the  new Offices proposed in the new Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the fact that for many years the accounts of EU expenditure have been unable to satisfy the accountants, Britain should make no additional contribution to the EU budget to support the post of President and his Office and that of the High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and any diplomatic service that he would require.
